snippet: Inflation in the 19-nation eurozone was stable in August at an annual rate of 0.2 percent, according to the European Union’s statistics agency, Eurostat.
lead_paragraph: Inflation in the 19-nation eurozone was stable in August at an annual rate of 0.2 percent, according to the European Union’s statistics agency, Eurostat.

headline.main: Eurozone Inflation Is Stable but Does Not Reach Target
headline.print_headline: Eurozone Inflation Is Stable but Does Not Reach Target
